mix.title: Sorrow-Vomit: 2020-09-05 (Live Mix: Post-Punk, Darkwave, EBM, Cold Wave, Synth, Goth)
mix.shortTitle: 2020-09-05 (Live Mix: Post-Punk, Darkwave, EBM, Cold Wave, Synth, Goth)
mix.description:
Recent releases and others tracks from 2020... Darkwave, Post-Punk, Minimal Synth, Coldwave, EBM, and Gothic genres. Recorded at home.
